verbs.description: Revelations that [ARG1: an FBI informant] [V: was] [ARG2: in contact with members of the Trump campaign] [ARGM-TMP: during the 2016 presidential election] have opened the door to a cascade of new details about those communications , emboldening Republican demands for a full accounting of how the Russia investigation began .

Revelations that an FBI informant was in contact with members of the Trump campaign during the 2016 presidential election [V: have] opened the door to a cascade of new details about those communications , emboldening Republican demands for a full accounting of how the Russia investigation began .

[ARG0: Revelations that an FBI informant was in contact with members of the Trump campaign during the 2016 presidential election] have [V: opened] [ARG1: the door] [ARG3: to a cascade of new details about those communications] , [ARGM-ADV: emboldening Republican demands for a full accounting of how the Russia investigation began] .

[ARG0: Revelations that an FBI informant was in contact with members of the Trump campaign during the 2016 presidential election] have opened the door to a cascade of new details about those communications , [V: emboldening] [ARG1: Republican demands for a full accounting of how the Russia investigation began] .

Revelations that an FBI informant was in contact with members of the Trump campaign during the 2016 presidential election have opened the door to a cascade of new details about those communications , emboldening Republican demands for a full accounting of [ARGM-MNR: how] [ARG1: the Russia investigation] [V: began] .
